# This file was generated by the YaTool build system (https://github.com/yandex/yatool),
# from a source YaTool build configuration provided in ya.make files.
#
# If the repository supports both CMake and ya build configurations, please modify both of them.
#
# If only CMake build configuration is supported then modify only CMake files and note that only
# simple modifications are allowed like adding source-files to targets or adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories. These modifications will be ported to original ya.make files
# by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be easily ported back to the ya build
# system may be rejected.
#
# Please refer to the build instructions in the repository for more information about manual
# changes in this file.

find_package(AIO REQUIRED)

add_executable(cloud-blockstore-vhost-server-gtest)


target_include_directories(cloud-blockstore-vhost-server-gtest PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/cloud/contrib/vhost
)

target_link_libraries(cloud-blockstore-vhost-server-gtest PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  library-cpp-cpuid_check
  cpp-testing-gtest
  cpp-testing-gtest_main
  blockstore-libs-common
  blockstore-libs-encryption
  libs-encryption-model
  vhost-server
  core-libs-common
  core-libs-diagnostics
  core-libs-vhost-client
  library-cpp-getopt
  cpp-getopt-small
  AIO::aio
)

target_allocator(cloud-blockstore-vhost-server-gtest
  system_allocator
)

target_sources(cloud-blockstore-vhost-server-gtest PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/cloud/blockstore/vhost-server/backend.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/cloud/blockstore/vhost-server/backend_aio.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/cloud/blockstore/vhost-server/critical_event.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/cloud/blockstore/vhost-server/histogram.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/cloud/blockstore/vhost-server/options.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/cloud/blockstore/vhost-server/request_aio.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/cloud/blockstore/vhost-server/server.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/cloud/blockstore/vhost-server/stats.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/cloud/blockstore/vhost-server/request_aio_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/cloud/blockstore/vhost-server/server_ut.cpp
)


add_test(
  NAME
  cloud-blockstore-vhost-server-gtest
  COMMAND
  cloud-blockstore-vhost-server-gtest
)

set_property(
  TEST
  cloud-blockstore-vhost-server-gtest
  PROPERTY
  LABELS
  MEDIUM
)

set_property(
  TEST
  cloud-blockstore-vhost-server-gtest
  PROPERTY
  ENVIRONMENT
)

set_property(
  TEST
  cloud-blockstore-vhost-server-gtest
  PROPERTY
  TIMEOUT
  600
)

vcs_info(cloud-blockstore-vhost-server-gtest)

set_property(
  TEST
  cloud-blockstore-vhost-server-gtest
  PROPERTY
  PROCESSORS
  1
)
